exception.invalid_imdb_id: Invalid imdb id! The id must start with tt and contain only numbers!
exception.invalid_search_length: Your search has too few characters! Your search text must be at least 3 characters long!
exception.conflict_watchlist: A movie in the watchlist cannot be deleted!
exception.conflict_max_proposed: You have reached the maximum number of proposed movies! You can only propose {max_proposeable_movies} movies!
exception.conflict_no_movie: The proposal is not a movie!
exception.not_found_or_not_proposer: Movie not found or you are not the proposer!

success.save: Movie {title} added successfully to the list!
